.
Handling an Outdated VA Form 21-22 or VA Form 21-22a
Send a development letter requesting completion of the current version of the
VA Form 21-22
or
VA Form 21-22a
, when a claimant submits an outdated version of the form.  With the letter
provide the current version of the form for completion, and
return the outdated form.
Important
:  If the outdated form was received in the Centralized Mail (CM) portal, print a copy of the form, create the development letter, and associate a copy of the development letter and the mail with the eFolder.
Reference
:  For more information on handling outdated forms, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 2.B.4
.
